description.message: ウェブ カメラでさまざまな効果を使用した写真を撮ることができます。
description.description: Short description of the Camera App.

beautyEffect.description: Beauty effect's name. Smooths skin and increases brightness.

grayscaleEffect.description: Grayscale effect's name. Makes the images in grayscale.

newspaperEffect.description: Newspaper effect's name. Makes the image look like in a newspaper.

normalEffect.description: Name of the normal effect, which means that no effect will be applied.

sepiaEffect.description: Sepia effect's name. Makes the image look like an old picture.

retro30Effect.description: Retro '30 effect's name. Makes the image look like a retro picture.

retro50Effect.description: Retro '50 effect's name. Makes the image look like a retro picture.

retro60Effect.description: Retro '60 effect's name. Makes the image look like a retro picture.

swirlEffect.description: Swirl effect's name. Makes the image look like a whirlpool.

cinemaEffect.description: Cinema effect's name. Makes the image look like from a movie.

vintageEffect.description: Vintage effect's name. Makes the image look vintage.

errorMsgNoCamera.message: 現在、カメラは使用できません。
errorMsgNoCamera.description: Error message shown when it was impossible to connect to the camera due to unavailability or busy camera.

errorMsgNoCameraHint.message: 別のアプリで使用されている可能性があります。
errorMsgNoCameraHint.description: Hint message shown below the main error message. A hint for a user why the error occured.

errorMsgGallerySaveFailed.message: 画像をギャラリーに保存できません。
errorMsgGallerySaveFailed.description: Error message shown when saving a picture to the gallery failed.

errorMsgGalleryLoadFailed.message: ギャラリーを読み込めません。
errorMsgGalleryLoadFailed.description: Error message shown when loading the gallery failed.

errorMsgGalleryDeleteFailed.message: 選択した画像は削除できません。
errorMsgGalleryDeleteFailed.description: Error message shown when deleting the selected file from gallery failed.

errorMsgGalleryExportFailed.message: 選択した画像は保存できません。
errorMsgGalleryExportFailed.description: Error message shown when saving the selected file to an external directory failed.

errorMsgNoWebGL.message: ハードウェア アクセラレーションは使用できません。
errorMsgNoWebGL.description: Error message shown when WebGL is not available.

errorMsgNoWebGLHint.message: お使いのパソコンで互換性のないグラフィック カードが使用されているか、ドライバが古い可能性があります。
errorMsgNoWebGLHint.description: Hint shown below the main error message, when WebGL is not detected.

filtersButton.message: フィルタを切り替える
filtersButton.description: Label for the toggle filters button.

maximizeButton.description: Text to speech Label for the maximize button.

closeButton.description: Text to speech label for the close button.

galleryImages.description: Text to speech label for the gallery list.

takePictureButton.description: Label for the red picture taking button.

dialogYesButton.description: Label for the accepting button in the confirmation dialog.

dialogNoButton.description: Label for the dismissing button in the confirmation dialog.

dialogOKButton.description: Label for the OK button in the alert dialog.

deleteConfirmationMsg.message: ギャラリーからこの画像を削除してもよろしいですか？
deleteConfirmationMsg.description: Confirmation message before removing a picture from the gallery.
